name: 7 days before the end of subscription email
description: Automation which reminds about the end of subscription. It is sent 7 days before the end of subscription, but you can change and adjust this time period to your needs.

actions.subject_value: Last chance to renew your subscription #{{ subscription.id }}
actions.heading_value: Your subscription #{{ subscription.id }} is going to end in 7 days
actions.message_text:
Hi {{ customer.first_name }}, We want to let you know that your subscription ends in 7 days. Why is the renewal so important? You will get:
  • access to our support,
  • updates, bug fixes, and new features,
  • fixed prices long as you will continue the subscription.
You can still renew your subscription. To do this please log in into your account and enable the auto-renewal. If you don't renew your subscription, you will lose access to support, updates, and downloads. What's next if I renew my subscription? The payment process is automated, so you don't need to do anything. To do it smoothly, please make sure that your payment method {{ subscription.payment_method }} is active, and you have sufficient funds {{ subscription.total }}.
actions._action_title: 7 days before the end of subscription email
